arts.ttl: Monaco predicted XI v Rennes: Paul Pogba in the squad, Lamine Camara and Vanderson return
arts.sum: AS Monaco are slowly returning to full strength. The Principality club have been dogged by injuries this season, but there are multiple returnees to face Stade Rennais on Saturday evening. …

arts.ttl: Sébastien Pocognoli says Paul Pogba ‘can be there’ against Rennes
arts.sum: It has not yet been confirmed, but the signs are positive for Paul Pogba (32) to make his AS Monaco debut this weekend and end a 26-month-long hiatus. Pogba joined…
